mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_tbl (user_id, item_code, quantity, item_color, item_size) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{item_code}, #{quantity}, #{item_color}, #{item_size})
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.item_code, i.item_title, i.price, c.quantity, c.item_color, c.item_size FROM cart_tbl c JOIN items_tbl i ON c.item_code = i.item_code WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id}
